sentences.sContent: The commandant has issued an order, which is posted everywhere, declaring that any civilian caught interfering with the railroad, its bridges, tunnels or trains will be summarily hanged.
sentences.sContent_eng: The commandant has issued an order, which is posted everywhere, declaring that any civilian caught interfering with the railroad, its bridges, tunnels or trains will be summarily hanged.
sentences.sCn: 他们的指挥官已下达一项命令，宣布凡妨碍或破坏铁路、铁路桥梁、隧道和火车等军事设施的平民，一旦发现，立即处以绞刑。

synos.tran: 司令官，指挥官；军事学校的校长

words.tran: 指挥的；居高临下的；威风凛凛的

trans.tranCn: 司令官，指挥官；军事学校的校长
trans.tranOther: the army officer in charge of a place or group of people
